title: BRIEF-PZ Cussons Affirms FY View, Sees "Consumer Fragility" In Key Markets
text:
BRIEF-PZ Cussons Affirms FY View, Sees "Consumer Fragility" In Key Markets

Stock Markets 31 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 16:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-PZ Cussons Affirms FY View, Sees "Consumer Fragility" In Key Markets Sept 25 (Reuters) - PZ Cussons PLC : * DISPOSAL OF FOOD BUSINESS IN GREECE AND LOCAL POLISH PERSONAL CARE BRAND LUKSJA FOR OVER £50M * KEY MARKETS CONTINUE TO BE IMPACTED BY CONSUMER FRAGILITY, WITH NIGERIAN ECONOMY REMAINING DEPRESSED * SEEING UNCERTAINTY IN UK AND HIGHLY COMPETITIVE MARKETS IN AUSTRALIA * Q1 CASH GENERATION IN LINE WITH EXPECTATIONS * UK PERSONAL CARE BRANDS WERE IMPACTED BY CONSUMER UNCERTAINTY AND HEAVY PROMOTIONAL ACTIVITY, LEADING TO LOWER REVENUE IN Q1 * ASIA PACIFIC REVENUE DECLINED VERSUS PRIOR YEAR IN Q1 * AFRICA REVENUE CONTINUED TO DECLINE ALBEIT AT A SLOWER RATE COMPARED TO LAST YEAR IN Q1 * ANTICIPATE MARKET CONDITIONS WILL REMAIN CHALLENGING ACROSS OUR KEY GEOGRAPHIES FOR BALANCE OF FIRST HALF OF YEAR * IMPROVEMENT IS ANTICIPATED IN H2, AS PLANNED MARKETING ACTIVITIES BEHIND OUR FOCUS BRANDS, OVERHEAD REDUCTION PROGRAMMES TAKE EFFECT * EXPECT FULL YEAR RESULTS TO BE IN LINE WITH PRIOR YEAR, ADJUSTED FOR IMPACT OF DISPOSALS * FY RESULTS DEPENDENT ON NO FURTHER WORSENING IN OUR KEY MARKETS, SPECIFICALLY UK AND NIGERIA

BRIEF-PZ Cussons Affirms FY View, Sees "Consumer Fragility" In Key Markets
